data.title: Romania Presentation
data.meta_description: Romania Presentation - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .ppsx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. Romania is a country located in Southeastern Europe bordering Hungary, Serbia, Ukraine, Moldova and Bulgaria. It has a population of 19.5 million people and its capital and largest city is Bucharest. Some of Romania's top tourist attractions include the historic Palace of Parliament in Bucharest, the Danube Delta biosphere reserve, mountain roads like Transfagarasan, Bran Castle associated with Dracula, and medieval towns with fortresses. The culture features traditional costumes, foods like smoked pork and stuffed cabbage, and famous people like gymnast Nadia Comaneci and sculptor Constantin Brancusi.
